articles.author: Ryan Hughes
articles.title: Franklin Manor co-owner steps down after ‘just shoot them all’ comment about protesters - WFLA
articles.description: The co-owner of Franklin Manor, a popular restaurant-bar in downtown Tampa, has stepped down effective immediately after receiving backlash on a comment he posted on Instagram about protesters in Tampa.

articles.title: Tiger Woods releases statement on George Floyd's death and protests - CNN
